OrgName: GfK Holding, Inc. and the following affiliated companies and trade names: GfK Boutique Research, Inc.; GfK Custom Research, LLC; GfK Etilize, Inc.; GfK US, LLC; GfK US Holdings, Inc.; IFR Monitoring USA, Inc.; GfK Kynetec; GfK MRI; Globaltivity
activities: The companies receive individual data collected via phone interviews, personal interviews, and online interviews from various European and U.S. sources. The data are compiled and usually reported in aggregate for market research analysis. Data may be reported individually in certain circumstances, but only for market research purposes and in accordance with the Code of Ethics and Standards of the Council of American Survey Research Organizations (CASRO).
corpofftitle1: Vice President, Integrity, Compliance and Privacy
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: The companies adhere to the CASRO Code of Ethics and Standards, which includes clauses pertaining to data protection and privacy compliance.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
